C_Cpp.clang_format_style: {ColumnLimit: 200, SortIncludes: false, FixNamespaceComments: false, BinPackParameters: false, IndentAccessModifiers: true, AlwaysBreakTemplateDeclarations: Yes, BreakBeforeBraces: Custom, BraceWrapping: {BeforeElse: true},SeparateDefinitionBlocks: Always,KeepEmptyLinesAtTheStartOfBlocks: false, AllowShortFunctionsOnASingleLine: None, AllowShortCaseLabelsOnASingleLine: true,  IndentCaseLabels: true}
